ygData.subject: Re: shadow knight mid-level armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Just asking, but I joined the list only recently.  How do you increase faction in MM? Thanks in advance Aeudar Shadowknight of Feeble Circle Rallos Zek
ygData.messageBody:
Just asking, but I joined the list only recently. How do you increase faction
in MM?

Thanks in advance

Aeudar
Shadowknight of Feeble Circle
Rallos Zek

> From: demon42@...
>
> No, I mean, even as a DE I have always been KOS in MM, so i figured what the

> from me), So now I have to kill that high elf princess in HH to repair the
> damage I have done.
>
> Tesaar Grimm
> Hand of Innoruuk
